front.title: Multiple-Recipient MESSAGE Requests in the Session Initiation Protocoln(SIP)

abstract.t: This document specifies a mechanism that allows a SIP User AgentClient (UAC) to request a SIP URI-list (Uniform Resource Identifierlist) service to send a SIP MESSAGE request to a set of destinations.The client sends a SIP MESSAGE request that includes the payloadalong with the URI-list to the MESSAGE URI-list service, which sendsa similar MESSAGE request to each of the URIs included in the list.
